thread.title: Clean, nice, great location
thread.title_full: Clean, nice, great location - Review of Ramada New York/Eastside, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: adventureday14
title: Clean, nice, great location
text: Julie at the front desk is friendly, recommends great places to eat and remembered our itinerary to let us know about airport transportation. We asked for a few repairs to our room and they were handled that same day. Leonora in housekeeping kept an eye on us and no matter what time we left each day, the room was made up by the time we returned each night. This place is a bargain!
